content.en: Bridge seismic control: Researchers have been investigating the effectiveness of various algorithms in controlling the response of cable-stayed bridges to seismic activity. These algorithms include variable dampers, magnetorheological fluid dampers, lead rubber bearings, hydraulic actuators, and semi-active control systems. The goal is to develop hybrid control strategies that can protect the bridges from damage caused by earthquakes.
content.da: Seismisk kontrol af broer: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer til at kontrollere reaktionen af skråstagsbroer på seismisk aktivitet. Disse algoritmer inkluderer variable dæmpere, magnetorheologiske væskedæmpere, bly-gummilejer, hydrauliske aktuatorer og semi-aktive kontrolsystemer. Målet er at udvikle hybride kontrolstrategier, der kan beskytte broerne mod skader forårsaget af jordskælv.
